title: See World
lyrics:
[Intro]
Hey (
This is Shaniya Davis, last seen wearing a blue sleep shirt and pink underwear
)
Yeah, hey (
The search for the little girl is now entering its eleventh hour in Fayetteville, and there are some disturbing new details
)
Uh, Fayettenam, nigga
Uh, Dreamville, nigga
J. Cole
Hey, uh
Nah, I ain't ready yet
Yeah
I ain't ready yet
Yeah, hey
[Verse 1]
Gettin' higher than the soul of little Shaniya
Ayy, to the ones that killed her, hope you burn in fire
I'm burnin' tires on the strip, tryna get a grip
Liquor in the cupholder, tryna get a sip
Six shots of Hennessy, I'm still goin' strong
Please numb me from the bullshit that's goin' on
That girl was five years old that they just murdered
And did some wicked shit to her that was unheard of
You fuckin' coward, ain't gotta tell 'em go to Hell
'Cause that's the shit that make them other niggas sick in jail, so you gon' feel it
Travel the world reppin' the city, know I'm gon' kill it
But yet, a nigga ain't got a clue how I'm gon' deal with
All the bullshit, niggas sendin' shots my way
You put a hit out on me, think that I'm gon' stop? No way
Gon' have to kill me or witness a nigga livin' so filthy
Young, Black, and wealthy, nigga, for that, I'm guilty
Still see all the fake shit
It's funny, somehow, thought the money could erase it, uh
No matter how much dough you got, you gotta face it
And to my niggas gone, hope you in a better place, if I make it, I'll holla

[Chorus]
See, world (Huh-uh)
You're no good (Uh, uh, hey)
Yeah, see, world
You're no good (Uh, uh)
No matter how I hate flashbacks and rewinds
Can't escape the pain that be trapped in my mind
Nigga, see, world (Uh, uh)
You're no good (Uh)
[Verse 2]
I got a chip on my shoulder the size of a Golden Nugget
The industry overlooked me, for that, I be holdin' grudges
Wouldn't take a chance on me, suddenly, it's oh, you love it
Let's get a Cole feature, that's gon' put you over budget, now
Picture bein' broke without no pot to piss in, then
Suddenly, your idols is your competition
Used to be like God to me, slowly losin' my religion
As these notes from my composition turn to compositions, then
Put it out and hope the world sing
We sippin' liquor for the pain that the world bring
We had dreams just to make it up the flag pole
Just to find out that our heroes were some assholes, y'all don't hear me
Maybe I had the world figured out wrong
When these niggas go from singin' our songs and waitin' on you
'Bout a year later, the same ones be hatin' on you
Every other record, these rappers be fakin' on you
Dog, we sing your songs, but we know that ain't you, huh
We know you gotta make the people pay you
'Cause either you play the game or watch the game play you
And be that broke motherfucker talkin' 'bout, "I stayed true"

[Chorus]
See, world (Huh-uh, hey)
You're no good (Uh, uh, hey, hey)
Yeah, see, world
You're no good (Uh, uh)
No matter how I hate flashbacks and rewinds
Can't escape the pain that be trapped in my mind
Nigga, see, world (Uh, uh)
You're no good
[Interlude]
By candlelight, they stood as one, numb with shock and disbelief
A little girl's body, found Monday, is believed to be five-year-old Shaniya Davis, missing since last Tuesday
Davis has been charged with the unthinkable, prostituting her five-year-old daughter
Security cameras spotted a man carrying Shaniya into a hotel last Tuesday
This man, police said, is now charged with Shaniya's kidnapping
Search parties found the girl's body yesterday a hundred feet off-road, wearing only a t-shirt
[Chorus]
See, world (Huh-uh)
You're no good (Uh, uh, hey)
Yeah, see, world
You're no good (Uh, uh)
No matter how I hate flashbacks and rewinds
Can't escape the pain that be trapped in my mind
Nigga, see, world (Uh, uh)
You're no good
